bookdesc00.en:
Tis true without lying, certain and most true.
That which is below is like that which is above
and that which is above is like that which is below
to do the miracles of one only thing.
And as all things have been and arose from one by the mediation of one: 
so all things have their birth from this one thing by adaptation.

bookdesc01.en:
The necessity of concealing the Art is
one of the chief anxieties of alchemists. 
We are sworn to secrecy by heaven and earth and hell,
by the four elements, by the height and the depth,
by Hermes, by Anubis,and by the howlings of Kerkoros.
An oath has been required of us to reveal
nothing clearly to any uninitiated being.

bookdesc02.en: Thence is born a spirit white as snow, \nand another spirit red as blood,\nwhich two spirits are contained in a third hidden thing.

bookdesc03.en: Heed my warning or death and decay will follow.

bookdesc04.en:
The definition of death is the disjunction of the composite, 
but there is no disjunction of that which is simple, for it is one.
Death consists in the separation of the soul from the body,
because anything formed out of two, three,
or four components must disintegrate, and this is death.
Understand, further, that no complex substance which lacks fire eats, 
drinks, or sleeps, because in all things which have a spirit 
fire is that which eats.

bookdesc05.en:
And the Lord spake, saying,
'First shalt hou take out the Holy Pin.
Then, shalt thou count to three. No more. No less.
Three shalt be the number thou shalt count, 
and the number of the counting shall be three. 
Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two,
excepting that thou then proceed to three.
Five is right out. Once at the number three, 
being the third number be reached, then,
lobbest thou thy Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch towards 
thy foe, who, being naughty in My sight, shall snuff it.'

bookdesc06.en:
Some Alchemists fancy that the work from beginning 
to end is a mere idle entertainment; but those who 
make it so will reap what they have sown - nothing. 
We know that next to the Divine Blessing,
and the discovery of the proper foundation,
nothing is so important as unwearied industry
and perseverance in this First Operation.
It is no wonder, then, that so many students
of this Art are reduced to beggary;
they are afraid of work, and look upon our Art as 
mere sport for their leisure moments. For no labour 
is more tedious than that which the preparatory part 
of our enterprise demands.

bookdesc07.en:
Among those who devote themselves to the transmutation of metals,
however, there can be no such thing as mediocrity of attainment.
A person who studies this Art, must have either everything or nothing.
An Alchemist who knows only half their craft, reaps nothing but disappointment 
and waste of time and money; moreover, they lay themselves open to the mockery 
of those who despise our Art. Those, indeed, who succeed in reaching the goal 
of the Magistery, have not only infinite riches, but the means of continued 
life and health. Hence it is the most popular of all pursuits.

bookdesc08.en:
Woe unto all ye fools! 
How ignorant are ye of this Art, for which ye would die if ye knew it! 
I swear to you that if kings were familiar with it, 
none of us would ever attain this thing. 
O how this nature changeth body into spirit! 
O how admirable is Nature, how she presides over all, and overcomes all.

bookdesc09.en:
In this way, then, Nature generates by means of 
this sulphur the different kinds of metals in the 
veins of the earth, according to the diversity of 
degrees and alterations.

bookdesc10.en:
Take, he tells us, the stone of gold, combine with humour which is
permanent water, set in its vessel, over a gentle fire until liquefaction
takes place. Then leave it until the water dries, and the sand and
water are combined, one with another;  then let the fire be more intense
than before, until it again becomes dry, and is made earth. When this is done,
understand that here is the beginning of the arcanum;  but do this many times, 
until two-thirds of the water perish, and colours manifest unto you.

bookdesc_corpse.en:
If all the mountains were of silver and gold, what would 
they profit a man who lives in constant fear of death? 
Hence there cannot be in the whole world anything better than our Medicine,
which has power to heal all the diseases of the flesh.

bookdesc_tree.en: The sacrifice of oneself to the pursuit of \nknowledge is the highest tribute to the gods.

perkdesc_breath_underwater.en: You can no longer drown, and can move in liquids with ease.

perkdesc_extra_money.en: You gain double the gold per nugget.

perkdesc_extra_money_trick_kill.en: 4x instead of 2x gold is dropped when death is an accident.

perkdesc_repelling_cape.en: Stains drop at a fast rate (when moving).

perkdesc_exploding_corpses.en: Enemies explode upon death, but you gain immunity to explosive damage.

perkdesc_saving_grace.en: If you would die and have more than 1 HP, your HP is set to 1 instead.

perkdesc_invisibility.en: You're invisible. Stains, casting spells, kicking and taking damage makes you temporarily visible.

perkdesc_no_damage_flash.en: Pain is inevitable, but damage flash is optional.

perkdesc_reverse_slowdown.en: Instead of slowing you down, slime allows you to move faster.

perkdesc_glass_cannon.en: Your spells are 5 times as powerful, but your maximum health becomes 50 and cannot be increased by normal hearts.

perkdesc_respawn.en: Upon death you respawn with 100 health.

perkdesc_protection_fire.en: You take no damage from fire.

perkdesc_protection_radioactivity.en: You take no damage from toxic sludge and other toxic things.

perkdesc_protection_explosion.en: You take no direct damage from explosions.

perkdesc_protection_melee.en: You take no damage from close-range enemy attacks.

perkdesc_protection_electricity.en: You take no damage from electric shocks.

perkdesc_teleportitis.en: You take 20% less damage. You teleport away every time you're hurt.

perkdesc_stainless_armour.en: You take 50% less damage as long as you have no active stain status effect.

perkdesc_edit_wands_everywhere.en: A divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands everywhere.

perkdesc_projectile_homing.en: Your spells home towards enemies very slightly.

perkdesc_dissolve_powders.en: Sand and other soft, powdery materials dissolve quickly in your presence.

perkdesc_shield.en: You gain a small, permanent shield.

perkdesc_revenge_explosion.en: You release a magical explosion upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against explosions.

perkdesc_electricity.en: You're immune to electric damage, but metal and liquids around you electrify constantly. Look out!

perkdesc_double_hp.en: Your maximum HP is doubled, but you take 20% more damage from projectiles.

perkdesc_berserk.en: The less HP you have, the more damage your spells deal, up to +300% extra damage.

perkdesc_shuffle_wands.en: All your wands are replaced with random wands of approximately equal power.

perkdesc_heavy_ammo.en: You gain a selection of 2 powerful spells.

perkdesc_liquid_movement.en: Liquids don't affect your movement at all.

perkdesc_extra_shop_item.en: There will be an additional item in every Holy Mountain you haven't discovered yet.

perkdesc_poison_burn.en: Your projectiles have a chance to ignite poisoned enemies.

perkdesc_low_gravity.en: All creatures, you included, have lower personal gravity.

perkdesc_destruction_enchancement.en: You can destroy the environment more effectively.

perkdesc_damaging_aura.en: Your spells damage nearby enemies even if they don't hit them.

perkdesc_thunder_kick.en: Your kicks instantly kill most foes, and push objects more.

perkdesc_vision.en: You can see more into the darkness.

perkdesc_telepathic_vision.en: Darkness is no more, but enemies always know where you are.

perkdesc_no_more_knockback.en: Enemies can no longer knock you back.

perkdesc_knockback_control.en: You can steer while being knocked back.

perkdesc_roll_again.en: You get a new set of perks to choose from.

perkdesc_reveal_secrets.en: Chests, hearts and other items shine through darkness.

perkdesc_potion_drop.en: Enemies have a chance of dropping a random potion upon death.

perkdesc_gold_no_disappear_while_seen.en: Gold doesn't disappear as long as it can be seen.

perkdesc_juggernaut.en: Your projectiles deal 30% more damage, but are 30% slower.

perkdesc_big_potions.en: Potions you find contain double the liquid.

perkdesc_extra_charges.en: Spells with limited uses can be used twice as many times.

perkdesc_fast_projectiles.en: Your projectile spells fly faster than before.

perkdesc_deadly_environment.en: Creatures take increased damage from poison and other liquids, fire, and more.

perkdesc_cursed_power.en: All your wands gain extra damage but become uncustomizable.

perkdesc_randomize_spells.en: All spells in your inventory are replaced with a random spell.

perkdesc_personal_raincloud.en: You gather water when standing in a pool, and release it if you shoot at the cloud that follows you.

perkdesc_helper_orb.en: An orb flies near you and attacks your enemies.

perkdesc_extra_wand_slot.en: You can carry one extra wand.

perkdesc_extra_potion_slot.en: You can carry one extra item.

perkdesc_extra_action_storage.en: You gain more room for spells

perkdesc_persuasion.en: Enemies with low health may start fighting for you.

perkdesc_permanent_flying.en: You can fly forever, but standing on the ground deals you damage over time.

perkdesc_melt.en: Your enemies' corpses melt into slime.

perkdesc_double_cast.en: Your wands cast one extra spell when used.

perkdesc_ability_actions_materialized.en: Bomb-like spells can be placed in the ITEMS space in inventory and used like throwable items.

actiondesc_lightning_ray.en: Makes a projectile cast lightning in random directions

actiondesc_tentacle_ray.en: Makes a projectile cast tentacles in random directions

actiondesc_tentacle_ray_enemy.en: Makes creatures hit by a projectile grow tentacles in a chaotic manner

actiondesc_hitfx_toxic_charm.en: Makes a projectile charm creatures covered in toxic sludge

actiondesc_tentacle_portal.en: Summons a one-way portal to a sinister realm

actiondesc_static_to_sand.en: Makes any hard, solid materials within a projectile's range turn into sand

actiondesc_gravity_field_enemy.en: Makes creatures hit by a projectile gain a temporary gravity well that draws projectiles in

actiondesc_summon_hollow_egg.en: Summons an otherwise empty egg that casts a spell upon cracking open

actiondesc_buckshot.en: A formation of three small, fast bolts

actiondesc_lifetime.en: Increases the lifetime of a spell

actiondesc_shortlived_shot.en: Makes a projectile lasts only a very short amount of time, but deal more damage

actiondesc_wall_horizontal.en: A thin, horizontal barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

actiondesc_wall_vertical.en: A thin, vertical barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

actiondesc_wall_square.en: A thin, square-shaped barrier that harms passing creatures, including you

actiondesc_purple_explosion_field.en: Small explosions appear randomly over a large area

actiondesc_light_shot.en: Makes a projectile move considerably faster, but deal less damage

actiondesc_commander_bullet.en: Any projectiles shot alongside the command bolt will be attracted to it. Casts 3 extra spells upon being cast

actiondesc_disc_bullet_big.en: Summons a large, serrated disc with a curious flight pattern

actiondesc_bounce_explosion.en: Makes a projectile explode as it bounces

actiondesc_rocket_downwards.en: Makes a projectile separate into a bundle of 5 explosive bolts as soon as it moves downwards

actiondesc_piercing_shot.en: Makes a projectile fly through enemies, but harmful to the caster

actiondesc_clipping_shot.en: Gives a projectile the power to go through the ground

actiondesc_delayed_spell.en: A static, magical phenomenon that casts 3 extra spells after a short while

actiondesc_turret_spell.en: A static, magical phenomenon that casts 3 extra spells if an enemy approaches it

actiondesc_accelerating_shot.en: Causes a projectile to accelerate as it flies

actiondesc_avoiding_arc.en: Makes a projectile shy away from obstacles

actiondesc_lifetime_down.en: Reduces the lifetime of a spell

actiondesc_long_distance_cast.en: Casts a spell some distance away from the caster

actiondesc_teleport_cast.en: Casts a spell from the closest enemy

actiondesc_heavy_spread.en: Gives a projectile a much lower cast delay, but no respect to your aim

actiondesc_chain_bolt.en: Fires a mysterious bolt that jumps from enemy to enemy

actiondesc_glitter_bomb.en: Summons a bomb that explodes into volatile fragments

actiondesc_fireball_ray_line.en: Makes a projectile fire small fireballs perpendicular to its trajectory

actiondesc_pingpong_path.en: Makes a projectile fly back and forth

actiondesc_floating_arc.en: Makes a projectile float above the ground

actiondesc_teleport_projectile_static.en: After a period of time, you'll be returned to where you cast this spell

actiondesc_glowing_bolt.en: An extremely concentrated point of light that explodes after a moment

actiondesc_random_explosion.en: Makes a projectile launch a random spell (out of a limited selection) when it hits something

actiondesc_decelerating_shot.en: Makes a projectile decelerate as it flies

actiondesc_rocket_octagon.en: Makes a projectile launch 8 magical bolts if it moves slowly enough

actiondesc_blood_magic.en: Reduces a spell's mana cost and recharge time greatly, at the costs of four health points

actiondesc_fizzle.en: Gives a spell a small probability of short-circuiting

actiondesc_super_teleport_cast.en: Makes a spell immediately jump a long distance, stopped by walls

actiondesc_bounce_laser.en: Makes a projectile release a bundle of concentrated light as it bounces

actiondesc_magic_shield.en: Four guarding lights rotate around you for a time

actiondesc_big_magic_shield.en: Eight guarding lights rotate around you for a time

actiondesc_swarm_fly.en: Summons five flies to aid you in battle

actiondesc_swarm_firebug.en: Summons four fire bugs to aid you in battle

actiondesc_swarm_wasp.en: Summon six wasps to aid you in battle

actiondesc_friend_fly.en: Summons a friendly fly that attacks your enemies!

actiondesc_duplicate.en: Duplicates every spell cast before it

actiondesc_infestation.en: A bunch of magical sparks that fly in every direction

actiondesc_crumbling_earth_projectile.en: Makes a projectile crumble the earth it hits

actiondesc_random_spell.en: Casts a spell, any spell, at random!

actiondesc_random_static_projectile.en: Casts one random static projectile spell

actiondesc_draw_random.en: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand

actiondesc_draw_random_x3.en: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand three times!

actiondesc_draw_3_random.en: Casts three random spells among the spells in your wand

actiondesc_damage_random.en: Randomly increases or lowers the damage done by projectiles

actiondesc_alpha.en: Casts a copy of the first spell in your wand

actiondesc_omega.en: Casts copies of every spell in your wand

actiondesc_gamma.en: Casts a copy of the last spell in your wand

actiondesc_divide_2.en: Casts the next spell twice, but with reduced damage

actiondesc_divide_3.en: Casts the next spell 3 times, but with reduced damage

actiondesc_divide_4.en: Casts the next spell 4 times, but with reduced damage

actiondesc_divide_10.en: Casts the next spell 10 times, but with reduced damage

actiondesc_all_nukes.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a nuke, not a good idea

actiondesc_all_discs.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a giant sawblade

actiondesc_all_blackholes.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a black hole

actiondesc_all_rockets.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a magic missile

actiondesc_all_deathcrosses.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a death cross

actiondesc_all_acid.en: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a pool of acid

actiondesc_all_spells.en: You're heavily advised not to cast this spell.

actiondesc_add_trigger.en: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon collision

actiondesc_add_timer.en: Makes a projectile cast another spell after a short time

actiondesc_add_death_trigger.en: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon expiring

actiondesc_copy_field.en: A magical field that copies any projectiles near it

actiondesc_larpa_chaos.en: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself in random directions

actiondesc_larpa_downwards.en: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with a downwards trajectory

actiondesc_larpa_upwards.en: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with an upwards trajectory

actiondesc_delta.en: Casts a copy of the next spell in your wand

actiondesc_larpa_chaos_2.en: Makes a projectile leave a trail of copies of itself

actiondesc_chainsaw.en: A good tool for cutting meat. Also has some magical properties...

actiondesc_spore_pod.en: Summons a spore pod that attaches to a surface and then grows and explodes into spikes

actiondesc_energy_shield_shot.en: Gives a projectile a shield that deflects other projectiles

actiondesc_autoaim.en: Makes a projectile turns towards the nearest visible enemy

actiondesc_homing_rotate.en: Makes a projectile turn towards your foes

actiondesc_homing.en: Makes a projectile accelerate towards your foes

actiondesc_swapper_projectile.en: It was theorized that the source of qualia would be transferred …But it turns out it was the whole body all along.

actiondesc_propane_tank.en: Summons a propane tank. Be careful what you wish for.

actiondesc_megalaser.en: A spectral wand is summoned that casts a huge beam of light

actiondesc_bomb_cart.en: Summons a self-propeled mine cart loaded with explosives

actiondesc_tiny_ghost.en: Summons a tiny ethereal being to your help. It may cast stronger spells depending on how much damage you have suffered.

actiondesc_bounce_spark.en: Makes a projectile shoot bubble sparks as it bounces

actiondesc_cursed_orb.en: A projectile that brings bad luck to anyone it hits

perkdesc_extra_perk.en: From now on you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.

perkdesc_perks_lottery.en: When you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear.

perkdesc_genome_more_hatred.en: Creatures become more aggressive towards each other.

perkdesc_genome_more_love.en: Creatures become more friendly towards each other.

perkdesc_random_allies.en: You're allies with a random enemy group.

perkdesc_strong_kick.en: Your kicks deal extra damage and knockback.

perkdesc_projectile_repulsion.en: Most projectiles are repulsed by your presence, but you take slightly more projectile damage.

perkdesc_bleed_slime.en: You bleed slime, but slime no longer slows you down and you have higher projectile resistance.

perkdesc_multiply_hp.en: Your HP has been multiplied but you can no longer regain HP.

perkdesc_bleed_oil.en: You bleed flammable oil, but are immune to fire.

perkdesc_golden_i.en: Gold that you've seen no longer disappears over time.

perkdesc_extra_knockback.en: Your spells knock enemies around with more force.

perkdesc_lower_spread.en: Your spells have lower spread and extra damage, but have increased cast delay.

perkdesc_bounce.en: Almost all your spells bounce around and last longer.

perkdesc_projectile_homing_shooter.en: Your spells arc towards you, but gain extra speed and deal extra damage.

perkdesc_revenge_tentacle.en: You summon a monstrous tentacle upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against projectiles.

perkdesc_attack_foot.en: You grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.

perkdesc_plague_rats.en: Dying enemies release rats to serve your bidding! All rats become your friend.

perkdesc_leggy_feet.en: You grow disturbing looking limbs that fight for you.

perkdesc_always_cast.en: A random Always Cast spell is added to the wand in your hand, up to a maximum of 4.

perkdesc_no_more_shuffle.en: Most of the wands will be non shuffling. The wands you carry with you turn into non-shufflers too.

perkdesc_no_wand_editing.en: Wands cannot be tinkered with, but enemies may drop blood money.

perkdesc_projectile_duplicate.en: Your spells duplicate as they hit obstacles.

perkdesc_low_hp_damage_boost.en: Your spells deal 3x damage when you're under 25 HP or 25% of maximum health.

perkdesc_peace_with_steve.en: You make peace with your Gods.

perkdesc_trick_blood_money.en: Blood money is dropped when death is an accident.

perkdesc_levitation_trail.en: When levitating, you leave a trail of magical sparks that harm passing creatures.

perkdesc_wand_experimenter.en: Firing newly found and unmodified wands heals you.

itemdesc_mcguffin.en: This has been said to complete the Work

itemdesc_mcguffin_11.en: This has been said to complete the Work

itemdesc_mcguffin_12.en: This has been said to complete the Work

itemdesc_essence_air.en: Your being controls the air around you!

itemdesc_essence_alcohol.en: That was not the best of ideas

itemdesc_egg_hollow.en: I wonder if there's anything inside?

item_description_egg_slime.en: The egg is covered in slime

itemdesc_weathercrystal_book.en: It is said that to attain great wealth one must be ready to break the very foundation of this world. However, would one do that, they'd be cursed. Yet their own greed is a curse on its own...

itemdesc_runestone.en: A runestone with a strong magical aura. You feel like kicking it.

itemdesc_key_1.en: The key hums, but something is missing...

itemdesc_key_2.en: The key whispers secrets and promises, it is ready.

item_description_broken_wand.en: This wand has snapped in half but it still crackles with magical energy

item_description_thunderstone.en: This small rock makes you feel very charged.

item_description_brimstone.en: This tiny rock looks most fiery, but when touched only a pleasant warmth can be felt.

item_description_moon.en: This tiny celestial object has a strong gravitational pull.

item_description_waterstone.en: This small rock is hard and solid, yet seems to be gushing with water.

itempickup_orb.en: You discovered an orb of true Knowledge

itempickup_orb_evil.en: You discovered an orb of corrupted Knowledge

itempickup_orb_discovered.en: You found a familiar orb of true Knowledge

itempickupdesc_orb_00.en: Secrets of endless lava have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_01.en: Secrets of Earth's anger have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_02.en: Secrets of otherworldly life have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_03.en: Secrets of utter destruction have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_04.en: Secrets of Undeath have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_05.en: Secrets of fire and brimstone have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_06.en: Secrets of the Spiral have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_07.en: Secrets of stormy skies have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_08.en: Secrets of jubilation have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_09.en: Secrets of hidden danger have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_10.en: Secrets of rebuilding have been unlocked to you.

itempickupdesc_orb_11.en: This secret should not have been available for you.

itempickupdesc_orb_13.en: Secrets of great undoing have been unlocked to you.

menu_mods_help_exp.en:
This is an experimental feature.
Use at your own risk. Only run mods from trusted sources!
Upmost enabled mod will be loaded first.
Click mod name to enable/disable the mod.

This mod has requested extra privileges.
If enabled, it has full access to your computer,
even without using possible exploits in the game code.

and everything is compatible.

menuautosave_text.en: Autosave found. Looks like the game crashed?\nShould the game attempt to restore the autosave?

menuautosave_text_mods.en: Some mods were enabled and might have caused the crash.

menuautosave_text_earlyaccess.en: Noita is in early access, we'll try to fix this. :/

menu_switchthrowandspray.en:
We've changed the default values of a few settings:
-Input bindings for Throw and Spray have been swapped around.
-Inventory needs to be closed to cast spells.
Would you like to enable the new defaults? These can be changed in the Options menu.

menu_newgame_modschangedrestart.en: The game will restart due to mod changes.

menu_streaming_description.en: Let stream viewers interact with your game through the Twitch chat.

menu_streaming_description_details.en: Chat messages “1”, “2”, “3” and “4” will be counted as votes towards\nvarious events that are selected from a random pool.

menu_streaming_voting_hint.en: Allow stream viewers to vote on events that take place in the game.

menu_streaming_allowusernames_hint.en: Allow events that display chat user names

menu_streaming_timevoting_hint.en: The duration of a single vote

menu_streaming_distribution_hint.en:
Awful = very likely to ruin your run..
Bad = bad things can happen.
Neutral = not necessarily goot or bad.
Good = more health and other helpful events.

menu_streaming_usernames_ghosts.en: Tiny ghosts can be named after viewers: $0

menu_streaming_usernames_rats.en: Rats can be named after viewers: $0

streaming_integration_votetie.en: It's a tie! Picking random winner

menu_replayedit_writinggif.en: Writing gif - please wait – press $0 to cancel

logdesc_heart_evil.en: Increased maximum health to $0 ...with the cost of being cursed!

log_altar_magic_worm.en: That is not what you seek!

log_moon_altar.en: The four essences reveal their secret

logdesc_moon_altar.en: The moon's egg cracks open. Its contents have been unlocked

logdesc_moon_altar_drunk.en: The moon spills and unlocks its inebriating contents

logdesc_heart_fullhp_temple.en: Increased maximum health by $0 and restored health to $1 (regained $2 health)

log_ocarina_done.en: Seems like the musical energy is gone...

log_overingestion_01.en: Eating any more might kill you

log_overingestion_03.en: Eating any more might kill you

log_overingestion_05.en: Eating any more might kill you

log_overingestion_exploding_01.en: You're feeling like you'll soon explode

log_overingestion_exploding_03.en: You're feeling like you'll soon explode

log_overingestion_exploding_04.en: You're feeling an explosive tightness in your stomach

log_overingestion_exploding_05.en: You're feeling an explosive tightness in your stomach

log_kantele_done.en: Seems like the musical energy is gone...

logdesc_alchemist_key_second.en: ”I can give you so much in exchange for...”

logdesc_weathercrystal_broken.en: Your desire for treasures will surely be your undoing.

logdesc_gods_are_impressed.en: The Gods are very impressed with you

logdesc_temple_peace_temple_break.en: The Gods look the other way

log_altar_success_01.en: The Gods are satisfied with your sacrifice

log_altar_success_02.en: The Gods are happy with your sacrifice

log_altar_fail_00.en: The Gods aren't happy with your sacrifice

log_altar_fail_01.en: The Gods sneer at your untrained sacrifice

log_altar_fail_02.en: The Gods mock your crude sacrifice

log_altar_fail_03.en: The Gods scorn at your illiterate sacrifice

log_reality_mutation_01.en: You sense things are no longer what they used to be

log_reality_mutation_03.en: You feel the rules of the Cosmos have shifted

log_reality_mutation_04.en: You sense the reality has shifted

statusdesc_reality_mutation.en: You sense things are no longer what they used to be.

bookdesc_allspells.en:
None other than you is teacher of the truth,
wherever and from whatever source it is manifest.
 
You hear nothing true from me which you have not first told me.
 
Truth, when did you ever fail to walk with me,
teaching me what to avoid and what to seek....
Without you I could discern none of these things.

gamemode_normal_desc.en: Explore a new world.\nThe original Noita experience.

gamemode_dailyrun_desc.en:
New day, new world.
Some starting items are randomized.
Every player is playing the same seed.
Be careful, you can only play once in 24 hours.

gamemode_nightmare_desc.en: For a more challenging experience.\nUnlock this mode by completing the game.

gamemode_newgameplus_desc.en: For a more challenging experience.\nUnlock this mode by completing the game.

gamemode_laboratory_desc.en: Play around with magic to your heart's content.\nDeath is not a problem.\nUnlock new spells for this mode by casting them.

gamemode_nightmare_desc_PETRI_is_this_co.en: Every day a new run setup and a\n chance to play later biomes.\n Play the same seed as many times as you want.

gamemode_daily_practice_run_desc.en:
Start a run from a randomized spot,
with randomized items.
You can try the same seed as many times as you like
within 24 hours.

menureleasenotes_betawarning.en: Welcome to the Noita 1.0 Beta version!\nBe warned, the game will probably be less stable here compared to the master branch.\nHappy noiting!

menureleasenotes_betawarning2.en: Welcome to the Noita beta branch!\nBe warned, the game will probably be less stable here compared to the master branch.

inventory_chargecapacity_tooltip.en: The amount of charge this wand can store.

statusdesc_worm_attractor.en: You feel like you're future worm food.

statusdesc_protection_all.en: You feel strange strength in your body.

statusdesc_cryptpoison.en: You lose health until you locate a rare antidote.

statusdesc_satiated01.en: You can still fit more in your stomach.

statusdesc_satiated02.en: You're feeling full. Any more food will make movement difficult.

statusdesc_satiated04.en: You're feeling sickly full. Any more food might hurt you.

statusdesc_satiated05.en: You're feeling sickly full and choking.

statusdesc_satiated06.en: You most certainly don't feel like eating more.

statusdesc_ingestion_damage.en: Any more food or drinking will hurt you.

statusdesc_ingestion_exploding.en: You're feeling so full you might explode.

statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_01.en: You drank too much.\nAiming is disturbed.

statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_02.en: You drank way too much.\nAiming is disturbed.\nDrinking more will make you Poisoned

statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_03.en: You drank way too much.\nAiming is disturbed.\nDrinking more will give you brain damage

statusdesc_trip_00.en: You sense that something is off.

statusdesc_trip_01.en: You feel in harmony with the magical forces.

statusdesc_food_poisoning.en: You're feeling sick. Nothing stays inside.

statusdesc_ingestion_freezing.en: You're feeling cold inside. Movement is difficult.

statusdesc_curse_cloud_00.en: You feel like there's a dark cloud hanging over you.

statusdesc_curse_cloud_01.en: The weight of the cloud is almost unbearable. Your head hurts.

statusdesc_curse_cloud_02.en: All the foul thoughts you have ever had wash over you.

statusdesc_jarate.en: Wet clothes protect you from fire.\nYou sense an increased danger of receiving a critical hit.

streamingeventdesc_protect_enemies.en: Nearby creatures temporarily block all incoming damage

streamingeventdesc_polymorph_enemies.en: Nearby creatures polymorph into random beings

streamingeventdesc_tiny_ghost_player.en: You get a few tiny ghost friends

streamingeventdesc_tiny_ghost_enemy.en: Nearby creatures get tiny ghost friends

streamingeventdesc_homing_enemy_projecti.en: Nearby enemies' projectiles accelerate toward you

streamingeventdesc_protect_player.en: You become invincible for some time

streamingeventdesc_faster_player.en: You can move faster for a time

streamingeventdesc_oiled_player.en: A cloud of oil spawns on you

streamingeventdesc_sea_of_x.en: A huge body of random liquid is summoned

streamingeventdesc_sea_of_water.en: A huge body of water is summoned

streamingeventdesc_sea_of_oil.en: A huge body of oil is summoned

streamingeventdesc_sea_of_lava.en: A huge body of lava is summoned

streamingeventdesc_bouncy_shots.en: Your projectiles become bouncy for a time

menureleasenotes_noita10.en:
Welcome to Noita Epilogue Update!
Noita used be an Early Access game, so we want to send a huge thank you to all of you
who played Noita during its first year. Your feedback has been invaluable!
And to all the new Noita players... Welcome and best of luck!
- Devs

release_notes_10_highlights.en:
HIGHLIGHTS:
New Daily Practice Run game mode.
Twitch integration - let stream viewers make your game even more more chaotic.
Biome modifiers - biomes are sometimes a bit different from the usual form.
Some biomes have simulated temperature effects.
Lots of gameplay and UI tweaks and additions.
Visual and audio enhancements.
New spells, perks, enemies, materials, secrets, sounds and more.
Over 15 new music music tracks: Underground Jungle, Vault, Temple of the Art and more.
Performance optimizations and bug fixes.
Options menu overhaul.

”Here I'm safe. I am safe.
I left the others behind, and I have locked my research so that only those with real understanding can reach it.
I should not worry. As long as I resist the temptation, I will be safe.
I know my limits. Here I am far away from them.

I should not worry.”

”The one below listens to my songs...
 
G D# G E A
 
E C B G# F”

itemdesc_book_s_a.en:
”Among the great Alchemical endeavours there are some that,
while not equal to the Great Work, nonetheless are revered greatly
for the deific potence they instill to whomsoever succeeds
in harnessing their Power.

The One I am to discuss calls for a Seed of great promise, hidden deep within the Soil of this Earth...”

itemdesc_book_s_b.en: ”...Bring the slumbering Seed to life by letting it soak in the rays of the Sun, on the pinnacle of past civilizations...”

itemdesc_book_s_c.en: ”...The Alchemical process requires great Fire and Heat; for this purpose,\nlay the Stone in Fiery Earth and bring forth its transformation with great magical Heat of Destruction...”

itemdesc_book_s_d.en: ”...Once finished, It will sustain life; to this end, its Creation asks for a substantial amount\nof Life Force. Let the Egg engulf One Hundred of your Foes and drink their Blood...”

itemdesc_book_s_e.en: ”...As a final step, imbue the Youngling with the crystallized Essences of\nthe Four Elements. But beware, for the Youngling is susceptible to corruptive influence...”

itemdesc_book_music_c.en: ”Once the Key has listened to you, bring it home...\nOne home in the sky, beyond the invisible steps...\nOne home in the underworld, below seas of magma...”

itemdesc_book_robot.en: ”This machinery is unlike any I've seen before. Did the Hiisi create it? Or was it always here?”

menureleasenotes_noita11.en:
Welcome to Noita Epilogue 2 Update!
Noita used be an Early Access game, so we want to send a huge thank you to all of you
who played Noita during its first year. Your feedback has been invaluable!
And to all the new Noita players... Welcome and best of luck!
- Devs

biomemodifierdesc_invisibility.en: You suddenly have trouble focusing your eyes...

itemdesc_book_essences.en:
”The four Essences represent the four Elements that form this visible World...
Imbued with their Terrible Power, one may do great deeds,
but one should be Afraid of their destructive Might. To this end,
we have Devised a way to remove these Dangerous Forces; seek it in the West and East.

A Legend also tells that all the Elements originated from the Egg of Sky and return to It one day...”

itemdesc_book_hint.en:
”One of my brethren ran away in order to escape our predicament ...
They felt our understanding of this world was to be forbidden.
They hid something here, in this room, but...
...I lack the ability to truly see what is here!”

actiondesc_blood_to_power.en: A projectile gains additional damage at the cost of 20% of your health

actiondesc_meat_to_power.en: Gives a projectile the ability to suck up nearby blood and meat, increasing its damage

actiondesc_toxic_to_power.en: Gives a projectile the ability to suck up nearby toxic sludge and poison, increasing its damage

itemdesc_book_diamond.en:
”In my dream I saw a great Diamond...
It invited me within, offering me Grand Treasures.
This it said to me:
'If you wish to follow the Path I show you here, you must bring me one of these Two:
a terrible Curse of Avarice, or the most Singular being in this realm.'
I do not fully understand these words, but I still see the Diamond in my mind's eye...”

perkdesc_iron_stomach.en: You no longer suffer from negative effects of eating.

actiondesc_bounce_small_explosion.en: Makes a projectile release damaging sparks as it bounces

actiondesc_bounce_lightning.en: Makes a projectile release powerful lightning as it bounces

actiondesc_bounce_hole.en: Makes a projectile remove earth as it bounces

actiondesc_zero_damage.en: Increases a projectile's duration dramatically but removes all damage & explosion from it

actiondesc_caster_cast.en: Causes a projectile to be cast from where the caster is standing

actiondesc_white_hole_big.en: A growing orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach

actiondesc_true_orbit.en: Makes a projectile rotate around the caster like an orbiting planet

actiondesc_hook.en: A glowing hook that pulls the caster towards itself upon collision

actiondesc_anti_homing.en: Makes a projectile accelerate away from your foes

actiondesc_sea_swamp.en: Summons a large swamp below the caster

actiondesc_homing_wand.en: Makes a projectile accelerate towards wands

actiondesc_quad_shot.en: Casts copies of a projectile in a tetragonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

actiondesc_i_shot.en: Casts a copy of a projectile behind you, but the copy still cost mana

actiondesc_t_shot.en: Casts copies of a projectile above and below you, but the copies still cost mana

actiondesc_w_shot.en: Casts copies of a projectile in a trifurcated pattern, but the copies still cost mana

actiondesc_y_shot.en: Casts a copy of a projectile in a bifurcated pattern, but the copy still cost mana

actiondesc_penta_shot.en: Casts 5 copies of a projectile in a pentagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

actiondesc_hexa_shot.en: Casts 6 copies of a projectile in a hexagonal pattern, but the copies still cost mana

actiondesc_antiheal.en: A projectile that at first deals damage, then heals over time

actiondesc_clustermod.en: Makes a projectile release a cluster of explosive bolts upon hitting a wall

actiondesc_turretmod.en: Releases a spirit that fires copies of a projectile towards targets

perkdesc_bigger.en: Your projectile and explosive resistances increase, but you're easier to hit.

perkdesc_smaller.en: You're harder to hit, but take more projectile and explosive damage.

perkdesc_lich.en: You take on a hideous new form!

actiondesc_holy.en: A fast-flying, penetrating lance that glows with power

DO_NOT_USE_actiondesc_curse_wither_proje.en: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra projectile damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to projectile damage

DO_NOT_USE_actiondesc_curse_wither_explo.en: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra explosion damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to explosive damage

DO_NOT_USE_actiondesc_curse_wither_melee.en: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra melee damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to melee damage

DO_NOT_USE_actiondesc_curse_wither_elect.en: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra electricity damage for a time. Doesn't work on targets immune to electric damage

perkdesc_vampirism.en: You lose 25% maximum health, but can replenish health by drinking blood.\nBlood doesn't affect satiation level and you no longer suffer from food poisoning.

statusdesc_mammi_eater.en: You have gained a persistent nickname.

actiondesc_touch_piss.en: Transmutes everything in a short radius into urine, including walls, creatures... and you

actiondesc_touch_grass.en: Transmutes everything in a short radius into Earth, including walls, creatures... and you. Unless…

actiondesc_cessation.en: The caster enters the realm of no realm

actiondesc_white_hole.en: An orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its path

actiondesc_white_hole_giga.en: A massive orb of positive energy that destroys everything in its reach

logdesc_boss_meat_death.en: The air feels easier to breathe

actiondesc_sea_mimic.en: Summons a large body of mimicium under the caster

bookdesc_barren.en: Those who attain the fruit of the House above the Triadic Tomb shall hold this truth:\nThe Holiest Ground is most fertile when touched by Our Water.

perkdesc_fast_travel_boom.en: Some explosions can be amplified to vast proportions through the use of additional perks.

log_gods_looking.en: The Gods are looking for you

logdesc_gods_looking.en: The Gods are looking for you

perkdesc_respawn_spent.en: Upon death you respawn with 100 health.

perks.name: Critical Hit +
perks.description: You get more critical hits

perks.name: Breathless
perks.description: You can no longer drown, and can move in liquids with ease.

perks.name: Greed
perks.description: You gain double the gold per nugget.

perks.name: Trick Greed
perks.description: 4x instead of 2x gold is dropped when death is an accident.

perks.name: Gold Is Forever
perks.description: Gold nuggets never disappear.

perks.name: Trick Blood Money
perks.description: Blood money is dropped when death is an accident.

perks.name: Exploding Gold
perks.description: Gold dropped by enemies explodes when it disappears, is picked up or touched by other enemies!

perks.name: Strong Levitation
perks.description: You can fly 100% longer.

perks.name: Faster Levitation
perks.description: You levitate 75% faster.

perks.name: Faster Movement
perks.description: Your movement speed is increased.

perks.name: Never Skip Leg Day
perks.description: Your kicks deal extra damage and knockback.

perks.name: Telekinetic Kick
perks.description: You gain new telekinetic powers.

perks.name: Repelling Cape
perks.description: Stains drop at a fast rate (when moving).

perks.name: Exploding Corpses
perks.description: Enemies explode upon death, but you gain immunity to explosive damage.

perks.name: Saving Grace
perks.description: If you would die and have more than 1 HP, your HP is set to 1 instead.

perks.name: Invisibility
perks.description: You're invisible. Stains, casting spells, kicking and taking damage makes you temporarily visible.

perks.name: More Blood
perks.description: Blood blood blood.

perks.name: All-Seeing Eye
perks.description: You can see everywhere.

perks.name: Levitation Trail
perks.description: When levitating, you leave a trail of magical sparks that harm passing creatures.

perks.name: Vampirism
perks.description: You lose 25% maximum health, but can replenish health by drinking blood.\nBlood doesn't affect satiation level and you no longer suffer from food poisoning.

perks.name: Extra Health (One-off)
perks.description: You gain 50% extra maximum health.

perks.name: Stronger Hearts
perks.description: Hearts bestow more maximum health.

perks.name: Glass Cannon
perks.description: Your spells are 5 times as powerful, but your maximum health becomes 50 and cannot be increased by normal hearts.

perks.name: Living on the Edge
perks.description: Your spells deal 3x damage when you're under 25 HP or 25% of maximum health.

perks.name: Extra Life (One-off)
perks.description: Upon death you respawn with 100 health.

perks.name: Worm Attractor
perks.description: Worms find you attractive.

perks.name: Enemy Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby enemies.

perks.name: Eat Your Vegetables
perks.description: You inflict more damage the more satiated you are, but you start losing health if your stomach is empty.

perks.name: Iron Stomach
perks.description: You no longer suffer from negative effects of eating.

perks.name: Wand Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby wands.

perks.name: Item Radar
perks.description: You can sense nearby items.

perks.name: Moon Radar
perks.description: You can sense lunar energy.

perks.name: Spatial Awareness
perks.description: If you stop for a moment, you can sense your location relative to the Mountain.

perks.name: Fire Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from fire.

perks.name: Toxic Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from toxic sludge and other toxic things.

perks.name: Explosion Immunity
perks.description: You take no direct damage from explosions.

perks.name: Melee Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from close-range enemy attacks.

perks.name: Electricity Immunity
perks.description: You take no damage from electric shocks.

perks.name: Teleportitis
perks.description: You take 20% less damage. You teleport away every time you're hurt.

perks.name: Teleportitis Dodge
perks.description: You teleport a short distance away when an enemy projectile is near.

perks.name: Stainless Armour
perks.description: You take 50% less damage as long as you have no active stain status effect.

perks.name: Tinker With Wands Everywhere
perks.description: A divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands everywhere.

perks.name: No Wand Tinkering
perks.description: Wands cannot be tinkered with, but enemies may drop blood money.

perks.name: Wand Experimenter
perks.description: Firing newly found and unmodified wands heals you.

perks.name: Healthy Exploration
perks.description: Every time you visit a new area, you regain 60 health.

perks.name: Bombs Materialized
perks.description: Bomb-like spells can be placed in the ITEMS space in inventory and used like throwable items.

perks.name: Homing Shots
perks.description: Your spells home towards enemies very slightly.

perks.name: Boomerang Spells
perks.description: Your spells arc towards you, but gain extra speed and deal extra damage.

perks.name: Unlimited Spells
perks.description: Most spells are now unlimited.

perks.name: Freeze Field
perks.description: Liquids freeze in your presence.

perks.name: Gas fire
perks.description: Gases near you ignite automatically.

perks.name: Dissolve Powders
perks.description: Sand and other soft, powdery materials dissolve quickly in your presence.

perks.name: Slime Blood
perks.description: You bleed slime, but slime no longer slows you down and you have higher projectile resistance.

perks.name: Oil Blood
perks.description: You bleed flammable oil, but are immune to fire.

perks.name: Gas Blood
perks.description: You bleed flammable gas instead of blood.

perks.name: Permanent Shield
perks.description: You gain a small, permanent shield.

perks.name: Revenge Explosion
perks.description: You release a magical explosion upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against explosions.

perks.name: Revenge Tentacle
perks.description: You summon a monstrous tentacle upon taking damage, and gain 25% resistance against projectiles.

perks.name: Revenge Rats
perks.description: When you take damage, there's a chance that a helpful rat minion is summoned

perks.name: Revenge bullets
perks.description: You return fire when hit by projectiles, and you gain 20% resistance against explosions and projectiles.

perks.name: Lukki Mutation
perks.description: You grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.

perks.name: Leggy Mutation
perks.description: You grow disturbing looking limbs that fight for you.

perks.name: Plague Rats
perks.description: Dying enemies release rats to serve your bidding! All rats become your friend.

perks.name: Spontaneous Generation
perks.description: Vomit near you evolves into helpful rat minions

perks.name: Cordyceps
perks.description: Fungal creatures spawn from the corpses of enemies killed by you.

perks.name: Fungal Colony
perks.description: Slime near you spontaneously turns into fungal creatures.

perks.name: Feared by Worms
perks.description: Worms run away from you, and worm and lukki enemies no longer destroy terrain while burrowing.

perks.name: Projectile Repulsion Field
perks.description: Most projectiles are repulsed by your presence, but you take slightly more projectile damage.

perks.name: Close Call
perks.description: You gain additional chance to deal critical hits as long as there are enemies near you.

perks.name: Fungal Disease
perks.description: When near danger, you sprout fungal growths.

perks.name: Projectile Slower
perks.description: Projectiles near you slow down.

perks.name: Projectile Repulsion Sector
perks.description: Projectiles that fly into a small sector in front of you get blown away.

perks.name: Projectile Eater
perks.description: Projectiles that fly into a small sector behind of you disappear.

perks.name: Phasing
perks.description: Projectiles seemingly phase through you.

perks.name: Angry ghost
perks.description: An angry spirit comes to your aid, copying nearby spells and projectiles.

perks.name: Hungry Ghost
perks.description: Summons a happy minion who'll eat enemy projectile every now and then.

perks.name: Mournful Spirit
perks.description: Dying creatures leave behind a spirit that deals damage in a small area.

perks.name: Homunculus
perks.description: Every time you leave a Holy Mountain, a helpful homunculus is summoned.

perks.name: Lukki Minion
perks.description: Summons a lukki minion to your help.

perks.name: Electricity
perks.description: You're immune to electric damage, but metal and liquids around you electrify constantly. Look out!

perks.name: Attract Gold
perks.description: Gold nuggets gravitate towards you.

perks.name: Extra Knockback on Spells
perks.description: Your spells knock enemies around with more force.

perks.name: Concentrated Spells
perks.description: Your spells have lower spread and extra damage, but have increased cast delay.

perks.name: Low Recoil
perks.description: Recoil caused by your spells is greatly reduced, but your spells fly slightly slower.

perks.name: Bouncing Spells
perks.description: Almost all your spells bounce around and last longer.

perks.name: Faster Projectiles
perks.description: Your projectile spells fly faster than before.

perks.name: Always Cast (One-off)
perks.description: A random Always Cast spell is added to the wand in your hand, up to a maximum of 4.

perks.name: High Mana, Low Capacity (One-off)
perks.description: Your currently held wand loses half its capacity, but gains more mana.

perks.name: No More Shuffle
perks.description: Most of the wands will be non shuffling. The wands you carry with you turn into non-shufflers too.

perks.name: No More Knockback
perks.description: Enemies can no longer knock you back.

perks.name: Projectile duplication
perks.description: Your projectile spells have a chance to duplicate, but you're more vulnerable to projectile damage

perks.name: Faster Wands (One-off)
perks.description: All wands you're currently carrying gain a bonus to their cast delay & reload time.

perks.name: Extra Wand Capacity (One-off)
perks.description: The wands you're currently carrying gain 1-3 additional spell slots (to a maximum of 25).

perks.name: Contact Damage
perks.description: Enemies near you take damage, the damage is higher the lower your health gets.

perks.name: Extra Perk
perks.description: From now on you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.

perks.name: Perk Lottery
perks.description: When you pick a perk, there's a 50% chance the others won't disappear.

perks.name: Gamble (One-off)
perks.description: You gain two random perks.

perks.name: Extra Item In Holy Mountain
perks.description: There will be an additional item in every Holy Mountain you haven't discovered yet.

perks.name: More Hatred
perks.description: Creatures become more aggressive towards each other.

perks.name: More Love
perks.description: Creatures become more friendly towards each other.

perks.name: Peace with Gods
perks.description: You make peace with your Gods.

perks.name: Kills to mana
perks.description: Every time an enemy near you dies, you release mana-recharging liquid.

perks.name: Rage-fueled Levitation
perks.description: Killing an enemy makes you replenish some of your levitation power.

perks.name: Pinpointer
perks.description: Your spells fly faster and have lower spread, and you have a handy sightline for aiming!

perks.name: Personal Plasma Beam
perks.description: You constantly fire a devastating plasma beam, but you fire spells much slower

perks.name: Summon Sädekivi (One-off)
perks.description: You gain an artefact that allows you to call the celestial rage.

spells.name: Alpha
spells.description: Casts a copy of the first spell in your wand

spells.name: Gamma
spells.description: Casts a copy of the last spell in your wand

spells.name: Tau
spells.description: Copies the two following spells in the wand when cast

spells.name: Omega
spells.description: Casts copies of every spell in your wand

spells.name: Mu
spells.description: Every modifier-type spell in the current wand is applied to a projectile

spells.name: Phi
spells.description: Casts a copy of every projectile-type spell in the current wand

spells.name: Sigma
spells.description: Copies every static projectile -type spell in the wand when cast

spells.name: Zeta
spells.description: Copies a random spell in another wand you're holding

spells.name: Divide by 2
spells.description: Casts the next spell twice, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 3
spells.description: Casts the next spell 3 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 4
spells.description: Casts the next spell 4 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Divide by 10
spells.description: Casts the next spell 10 times, but with reduced damage

spells.name: Meteorisade
spells.description: Alea iacta est

spells.name: Matosade
spells.description: Alea iacta est

spells.name: Wand Refresh
spells.description: Reloads the wand immediately

spells.name: Requirement - Enemies
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 15 enemies nearby

spells.name: Requirement - Projectile Spells
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 20 projectiles nearby

spells.name: Requirement - Low Health
spells.description: The next spell is skipped if you have more than 25% health left

spells.name: Requirement - Every Other
spells.description: The next spell is skipped every other time this spell is cast

spells.name: Requirement - Endpoint
spells.description: Any Requirement spells before this will skip all spells between them and this spell

spells.name: Requirement - Otherwise
spells.description: If a Requirement spell before this succeeds, the next spell is skipped

spells.name: Red Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a red sparkly trail

spells.name: Orange Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a orange sparkly trail

spells.name: Green Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a green sparkly trail

spells.name: Yellow Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a yellow sparkly trail

spells.name: Purple Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a purple sparkly trail

spells.name: Blue Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a blue sparkly trail

spells.name: Rainbow Glimmer
spells.description: Gives a projectile a randomly colored sparkly trail

spells.name: Invisible Spell
spells.description: Turns a projectile invisible

spells.name: Rainbow trail
spells.description: Gives a projectile a trail of rainbow

spells.name: Cessation
spells.description: The caster enters the realm of no realm
